products.name: Solar Powered Street Light
products.description: Street Light SL-101 is 1.5 meters tall, lasts up to 12 hours per night, and has auto on/off sensors. [Image](https://via.placeholder.com/150?text=Street+Light)

products.name: Solar Powered Driveway Light
products.description: Driveway Light DL-202 is 10 cm in diameter, lasts up to 8 hours, is waterproof, and supports motion detection. [Image](https://via.placeholder.com/150?text=Driveway+Light)

products.name: Solar Powered Wall Light
products.description: Wall-Mounted Solar Light WS-303 is 25 cm height, 15 cm width, lasts up to 10 hours, and includes features like Wall-mountable, Bright LED, Weatherproof. [Image](https://via.placeholder.com/150?text=Wall+Light)
